name: Karen Degraw
text: Great pizza~I love deep dish! Definitely much impressive than UNO's. Fantastic cook, greeted us as soon as we walked in the door. Very friendly staff, great good. I would recommend the food and service.....as far as the decor, it's tired …More

name: Cam Reese
text: Overpriced and not very good. Online ordering system is broken. Didn’t capture our order properly. Called and they offered no resolution. Bottom line though is the food kind of sucks... actually it really sucks. The pizza is undercooked. I …More

name: John Morris
text: We went at lunch time on a Tuesday and four the place mostly vacant.  We ordered a thin crust pizza and the kids,  who ate free, had spaghetti and cheese pizza. The service was good and the food was "ok". Yelp had ranked this as the #1 …More

name: David Randolph
text: Very good Chicago style pizza. And the spaghetti with meatballs and vodka sauce was good too. Service was good. We will be back!

name: Brittany Green
text: Update to the terrible experience: 3/27 in response to the owner. What i failed to mention in this review is how i was DISABLED & relying upon delivery for my meals and ended up having to drive on a bad foot to the store 3 hrs after my …More

name: Felix Berry
text: I am going to preface this review by saying that the food was amazing. There is no question about that. However, the service was terrible. I ordered food around 4:35pm stating that I was going to arrive to pick up my order at 5:15. The …More

name: Joan L.
text: The lunch specials are great.  The 1/2 meatball sub with a salad was delicious.  Sandwich had two LARGE meatballs with sauce and cheese and needed two hands to eat it.  Salad wasn't just lettuce, but had other veggies, cheese and a tasty …More

name: Keri Nelson

name: Greg Salmon
text: Great pizza!!  We were talking and enjoying the fantastic thin crust Chicago style pizza and realized one ingredient was missing.  We mentioned it to our server Bella and she immediately addressed the problem.  Doug the manager came over …More

name: Blu Morpha
text: We made reservations on 12/26 for my son's birthday. We found an online ad that said kids ate free on Tuesdays but when we got there a sign in the window said kids ate free on Wednesdays. When we showed the online ad to the waitress she …More

name: Wiley Adams
text: 10 Stars! Great family owned and inviting environment with amazing food and friendly staff! They also feature an impressive selection of gluten-free options, including homemade gluten-free pizza dough. I would recommend them for all of your …More

name: Ron Tanciar
text: Folks:  We ordered the thin crust pizza. Not the best pizza in the world.  Why?  All the ingredients on the pizza was covered with cheese.  I swear they hardly put anything on the pizza.  As far as I’m concerned they skimped on everything. …More

name: Chris Allen
text: The girl who answered the phone told me she doesn't know what a supreme style pizza is and put me through an entire 5 minute explanation of how your pizzas come plain and then you have to pay 2.50 per topping before finally informing me you …More

name: Laurent Lardin
text: I order a pizza at 3pm for a delivery at 6pm. After 30 minutes delay, we call the restaurant in order to check where was our delivery. No clear answer. I call 2 or 3 more times after waiting 30 minutes more but still no explanations. I …More

name: Brian Tapp
text:
Holy pizza! Just got the Italian beef thin crust here and it is the best pizza I have ever had. This includes a New York pizza I got at a pizzeria in New York.
High quality ingredients make a difference.

name: Anthony Wilson
text: Food is excellent the service sucks. I thought this was some random occurrence after reading the reviews of others it seems to be a normal thing. Ordered  my pizza and a salad at 6:11,-----7:31 no pizza called  and they said they  were busy …More

text: This is second time I’ve experienced placing a delivery and never getting it. If I could give a 0, I would. I placed an order and 1.5 hours later I called to check the status. I was informed that they were out of the items I’d ordered and …More

name: DJ B
text: The food is tasty but thats it. The service is unreasonably slow and the food takes forever! It doesnt matter if its pizza, subs, or pasta. A 40 min meal is a solid 2 hour wait. Every visit has mistakes or forgotten items that we had to …More

name: Mark Fulton
text: OMG this pizza is amazing!!! Delivery option available and is fast even when only one driver was on staff! Will not order delivery from those other pizza chains!

name: Kevin Proffitt
text: Fantastic pizza, especially the deep dish!! It takes a while longer to cook but we'll worth the wait. The wait staff are very friendly and well trained.   My drink cup never runs out which is a pet peeve of mine. ;-) …More

name: Marion F. Gatling
text:
I love this pizza. I can eat the leftovers without warming it - so good.
The pasta dishes are great and even the side salad is delicious!! …More

name: Becky Dawson
text: UPDATE: This place went downhill FAST. After waiting 55 minutes for a beef sandwich and having my pizza made incorrectly 4 times in a row, I refused to go back. They are supposed to open under new management, but I've found Nancy's Pizzeria and won't be back here again.

name: I am Seleria
text: Great food but not so good service. Today when my family ordered we were told our food would be delivered between 7:15pm-7:25pm. Well that didn’t happen by 7:25 the food wasn’t here. So we waited a little before calling. The lady on the …More

name: Harold Tacelli
text: I have eaten there more than once. Tried a variety of menu items. Love their pizza. I order it "light on the cheese, extra crispy". Closest to the Boston area pizza I have had since I moved here eight years ago. Chicken wings are as good as …More

name: Michelle Hilmes
text: Pizza was good but service was terrible. Our waitress left half way through our meal.  We got the fried pickles and they were expensive and only had about 10 pickles.  Bill was high and we only got 1 pizza and a appetizer. We had waters to drink.  I felt like we were ripped off. Never going there again.

name: T Scarboro
text: Rosati has the BEST pizza around!  I would recommend you dine in or carryout. Delivery times are extremely long (1 to 1.5 hours).  That's the only reason I didn't give 5 stars.

name: David Falwell
text: Great spot to come see the cubs, bears or Blackhawks.  Legit Chicago ingredients.  Real Chicago dogs.

name: Keith W
text: Came here with my wife on date night and the owner was there. ABSOLUTELY AMAZING customer service! He overheard we were on a time crunch for our movie and he pushed our order through so we could still make the movie!! On top of that, pizza …More

name: Jack Jilly
text: It’s ok but nothing like the original one in Chicago. Give it a try at your own risk. Unfortunately we won’t be back.

name: Adam Edsall
text: The best pizza in town. The owner is quite the gentleman. I like the place, the food, and the people running it a lot.

name: Curtis Edwards
text: Went for a post Chicago Cubs victory party for Chicago deep dish. New owner as of couple months ago, Chicago native nailed it. Food and atmosphere was OUTSTANDING. Service and delivery was getting whipped into shape he said. Definitely a must-go, and tell him the Cubs sent you!

name: Blue Jeans
text: It was really good, first few times was so amazing but last time I went there they forgot a lot of items.

name: Sheldon Bleiweiss
text: Extremely disappointed with their delivery service.  Ordered & paid for a pizza at 4:15 yesterday for delivery.  Was told it would take an hour. 2 hours later still no pizza!  Called in twice and was told that there was 1 driver, and he had …More

name: Dylan Bergeron
text: Went here to eat a few days ago, and have to say- it was delicious. Waitress was very nice, as was the owner Doug. Definitely will be coming back for more !

name: Rod Civis
text: Great food, but very poor service. 2 tables occupied in the whole restaurant and can't get service.  Too bad because food is good

name: Johnny D
text: We ordered pizza for a for a lunch meeting at work today. Great job! Great pizza! Everyone enjoyed it! Keep up the great work! We'll be back!

name: cj komons
text: 2 and 1/2 hours for delivery. Everytime we called they had an excuse. They continued to say if it doesn't come in 20 minutes call back. The girl on the phone had an attitude. The manager was "too busy to talk to me". When the pizza finally …More

name: Betty Crane
text: It brings us back to Chicago!  The owner is a delightful man who is very kind and accommodating, and the food  is GREAT!!

name: Tomi Lane
text: Best Chicago style food in the Triangle! Ive had the thin crust and deep dish pizza. Also have had the Italian beef. Must go if you are feeling homesick! Go Cubs Go!

name: Mike Whyte
text: Great daily specials, its a Chicago Bears pub but unfortunately a lot of cubs paraphernalia... needs more White Sox memorabilia

name: robin mullins
text: we LOVE this place!!! great food,good prices,and the owner-Smitty-is one of a kind. He always makes you feel welcomed,... like you are one of the family.

name: M G
text: Ordered delivery online. Email said 30-45 mins.  Called after waiting for an hour, was told the order had just gone out for delivery. Waited another 45 minutes, called and they said the same thing.  Cancelled the order, they were nice about …More

name: jessica Watson
text: This is the best pizza place in North Carolina to eat they are expensive that's why I only eat here when I have extra money but it is well worth it. the pizza is always full of toppings they have the best cannolis I have ever ate. when I am …More

name: Marvin Jay
text: Get their Chicago style pizza...it's worth the 45 minute wait

name: David Pro
text: Been looking for a Chicago pizza place for 20 years.  I'm looking no more,  this is it! Great staff and ownership.  Look forward to eating there again and again.

name: Erin Reilly
text: I placed a pick up order at 650pm tonight. I was told that it would be 40 mins. We went and picked the food up after the 40 mins was up and the food was not ready. My husband sat there for over 30 mins while one person worked the tables and …More

name: Elizabeth G
text: Never ordering from here again. Order was completely wrong. We asked for half pepperoni and the entire thing was pepperoni and I ordered a Harvest Salad that was missing half of the ingredients specified on the menu. I tried calling twice to tell them and no one answers the phone. Never again.

name: PizzaDave
text: Rosatis is temporarily closed, currently under going new management. We will be back up and running. -Dave. Doug will no longer be the owner.

name: Dan Borkush
text:
There needs to be a "no star" or "avoid this place" selection.
19May2016 was the first time in over a year that I ordered from the re-opened Rosati's in Wake Forest (the last time they took my order they were out of …More

name: Andrew Bunker
text: Been calling for over 45 mins straight no answer.. a pizza place that can’t answer the phone smh..

name: Dan Hunt
text: Ordered online and then found when I got there that they wouldn't let me use my credit card to pay! Then on top of that they had to re-enter my order and then charged me an extra $7! Couldn't believe they wouldn't honor the online price. …More

name: Lisa Smith
text: We order for delivery occasionally and the food is always excellent and we have just accepted the fact that it will always be at least an hour.  However, very seldom is it less than an hour and a half and more times than not, they forget to …More

name: ROAD RAT
text: Entered at 5:00 pm, we were the only ones there. Ordered at 5:15 pm. Was served at 6:37 pm. Had ordered 3 pizzas and what was served was not what we ordered and the pizzas we're burnt.  Never go there again.

name: Chris Rydell
text: I ordered a pizza and bruschetta online.  I came to pick up my order and there was no staff. Waited at front counter for over 10 minutes before an employee greeted me.  She handed me my pizza with no bruschetta.  I asked her where is the …More

name: Kristal Wilson
text: Ordered two cheese pizzas which came to $48! When it was delivered the crust on both pizzas was burnt. I called to speak with a manager and was told they were busy and would call me back. Hours later and still no call back, I called again …More

name: Cj Guion
text: If you are looking for good chicago style deep dish pizza, this is a place you should consider... I haven't had the experience of sitting down in this restaurant, but have placed a take out order and delivery order.

name: Steven Walton
text: Never again. We kept seeing Rosati's coupons in the mailers we get so we decided to give them a try. We sat down at 6pm to order via their website. The website is messed up and won't get past the section were you enter your address despite …More

name: Darrick Hunter
text:
Awesome Grub!!
Taste of Chi-Town right here in Wake Forest.
Small place but Big Taste

name: Tim Burch
text: Born and raised in Chicago, and have even worked at a Rosati's Pizza just outside of Chicago. Although the atmosphere inside this location made me feel like I was back home in Chicago, the pizza was FAR from Chicago style, and for that …More

name: Tanajah Lea
text: Great pizza! The sauce was a little salty, but it was delicious! Definitely try it out if you're looking to try Chicago pizza, but can't quite afford to travel there!

name: Nicole Cox
text: The food at this location is really good. The customer service there is awesome as well. They were quick and courteous.

name: Mari-Jonn Sothoron
text: Sorry for the negative but true review. Just picked up a take out 16inch for $26.00 because we liked the owner the first time we ate in. Great guy and most accommadating. This pizza was not good!  Actually burned black aroudn the edges …More

name: Adrienne Merlino
text: Most professional service from girl who I spoke to on the phone to the most professional delivery driver I have ever met.

name: Scott McClure
text: Perfection is worth the wait. Best pizza we have ever had! Awesome owner too.

name: Chris Leith
text: Very disappointed! Ordered a pizza for delivery. Over 2 hours - no pizza! Guests over to eat pizza and watch football. After several calls, the only compensation was "$10 off of next order". They got us! Because we will not order from Rosati's  again. The pizza was hot when it got here...NOT! The box wasn't even warm!!

name: Matt Roberts
text: Multiple phone calls over several evenings with the phone ringing 4-5 minutes each time...tried several times to order online but they have been taken off "Slice"...THEY DO NOT EXIST...IF there is a Rosati's in Wake Forest, NC they could …More

name: Jim Glugla
text: Their version of a deep dish pizza - which costs extra -  is the thinnest deep dish I have ever seen.  When I called to complain, someone named Bellatold me to take my business elsewhere.   Rosattis in Morrisville is better- Acme Pizza in Holly Springs is better.  You might as well do frozen UNOs than this place.

name: jwiels 12
text: You got to try it! We are from Chicago and were visiting our kids and picked up some pizza, italian beef sandwiches, and cheesy bread sticks. Fantastic! Just delicious! It tasted just like Rosati's back in Chicago which is excellent. …More

name: Gordon Harris
text: Great to finally have a really good Chicago deep dish pizza in Wake Forest.  We loved the sauce, It made the pizza spectacular!  We're already craving another.

name: Laura Brown
text: Best Chicago Pizza in the Triangle! 1st time eating at Rosati's tonight with my daughter and we loved the authentic chicago style pizza. We also received excellent customer service from the staff tonight.

text: Slow, slow, slow service. Completely understaffed.

text: Oh my gosh they got some of the best pizza pie you ever ate and pizza

text: For Chicago style pizza this place is pretty good.

text: Waited for 45 minutes, entrees came out, THEN we were told our pizza just went into the oven.   And we didn't order the deep dish, specifically because they told us it took a long time.  Never heard from a manager, either.  They offered us …More

name: clark walrod
text: There is something wrong with the wake forest franchise. I love rosatis and will drive 40 minutes down 540 to avoid this location. There is always an issue. However once every several months I try going back hoping something changed, nope. …More

name: Shawn Fraser
text: Good local spot if you're looking to dodge chain delivery pizzerias. They also have well made pastas and other entrees that are worth building into your routine.

name: Danny
text: I'm a huge fan of Rosati's but this location was hit and miss. Most times excellent but a few times was not as good. Highly recommend their chicago style deep dish.

name: Joshua Pniewski
text: This is authentic Chicago Deep dish... youre gonna wait for it for 45 min, but thats how long it takes to cook... your patience will be rewarded...

name: Crystal Blaisdell
text: At the time we came, it was slow. Service was great and food was hot and fast.

name: Polo Polo
text: I've had a thousand calzones from a lot of different restaurants. Rosati's is by far the best, their quality and care is exemplified through the taste and presentation. Great experience

name: Tanner Ottinger
text: Staff is outstanding and friendly. Pizza is good, and will be made within about 15 minutes of ordering.

name: Missy Garner
text: My family and I tried the pasta, hamburgers than the pizza. We got great food for a great price. The thin crust was great my boys even like it!

name: Eddie Gonzales
text: Great service and great food/beer will be coming back. Great hole in the wall for lunch or dinner

text: Grew up on Rosatti's Pizza in Chicago as a child and loved it - we at it almost every other day it. …More

My son ate the entire pizza which is not usual for him.  Additionally, I can vouch for the meatball parm, calzones, and their penne ala vodka.

This is pizza done right.
Forget pizza inn, Pizza hut, and all them cheap quick pizza places, this is what a pizza is sopose to be.

text: Asked for a pizza with light sauce . A medium Pizza for 25 dollars unable to eat . It came with extra sauce and 33 min late .. repeated the order over again and even called when they were late . Very salty from all the salt. Never again .

text: Terrible customer service. Tried calling in an order and called 5 times in a row with no answer. Will never give the wake forest rosatis my business again.
